flawed_nl_solution:
5% of $30 is (5/100)*30 = $<<(5/100)*30=3/2>>3/2
The dollar amount of Bob's discount is $3/2 so he will pay $30-$3/2 = $57/2
2% of $25 is (2/100)*$25 = $<<2/100*25=1/3>>1/3
The dollar amount of Kate's discount is $1/3 so she will pay $25-$1/3 = $<<25-1/3=74/3>>74/3
Altogether they will pay $57/2+$74/3 = $<<57/2+74/3=319/6>>319/6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1/2, not 1/3. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
